questions.question: Is the text "NATIONAL ZOOLOGICAL PARK, WASHINGTON, D.C." present at the top center of the image?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there is no visible text at the top center of the image. It features a fantastical creature with a creative design, and the focus seems to be on the visual elements rather than any textual ones.

questions.question: Is the text "WART HOG" present at the bottom center of the image?

questions.question: Is the ground beneath the warthog covered with dry, pale yellow straw?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the ground beneath the warthog is not covered with straw. Instead, it appears to be more natural terrain with elements like small plants and moss, reflecting a mystical forest environment rather than a zoo enclosure.

questions.question: Is the background behind the warthog a dark green-brown gradient, resembling an indoor or shaded enclosure?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the background is a dense, lush forest environment with rich greens and browns, creating an outdoor, natural setting. It does not resemble an indoor enclosure, but rather a mystical or fantasy forest.

questions.question: Is there a white border surrounding the image, separating the artwork from the edges?
questions.explanation: Image B does not feature any white border surrounding the artwork. The illustration fills the entire space, focusing entirely on the fantasy-style warthog and its vibrant natural surroundings, without any visual separation from the edge of the image.

questions.question: Is the code "5A-H618" present in the bottom right corner of the image?
